Title: Are you using all 3 GitHub Copilot modes?
Author: GitHub
Description:
Did you know there are three distinct ways to use GitHub Copilot? Get a sneak peek at Agent, Edit, and Ask modes in this quick teaser.

Ready for the full explanation? Watch our "GitHub Copilot deep dive" video now: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0Oz-WQi51aU
